Visualization

Displays point clouds in an Open Scene Graph (OSG) viewer. More...

Detailed Description

Displays point clouds in an Open Scene Graph (OSG) viewer.

Definition at line 44 of file OSGPointCloudVisualizer.h.

Member Function Documentation

void brics_3d::OSGPointCloudVisualizer::addColoredPointCloud ( PointCloud3D *  coloredPointCloud,
float  alpha = 1.0f 
)

Add an additional colored point cloud to the scene graph.

The scene graph will not be started, until visualizePointCloud() or visualizeColoredPointCloud() is invoked! So this method only allows to specify more than the one cloud in visualizePointCloud. It is possible to mix colored with non-colored point clouds.

Parameters:
[in]pointCloudPointer to colored point cloud that will be added to scene graph.
alphaSpecifies the amount of the alpha channel of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
void brics_3d::OSGPointCloudVisualizer::addPointCloud ( PointCloud3D *  pointCloud,
float  red = 1.0f,
float  green = 1.0f,
float  blue = 1.0f,
float  alpha = 1.0f 
)

Add an additional point cloud to the scene graph.

The scene graph will not be started, until visualizePointCloud() or visualizeColoredPointCloud() is invoked! So this method only allows to specify more than the one cloud in visualizePointCloud. It is possible to mix colored with non-colored point clouds.

Parameters:
[in]pointCloudPointer to point cloud that will be added to scene grpah.
redSpecifies the amount of red for the color of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
greenSpecifies the amount of green for the color of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
blueSpecifies the amount of blue for the color of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
alphaSpecifies the amount of the alpha channel of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f

float  alpha = 1.0f 
) [static]

Creates a "geode" (geometric node) element for OSG out of a colored point cloud.

Parameters:
[in]pointCloudPointer to colored point cloud that will be transformed into an OSG geode
alphaSpecifies the amount of the alpha channel of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f

Creates a "geode" (geometric node) element for OSG out of a point cloud.

Parameters:
[in]pointCloudPointer to point cloud that will be transformed into an OSG geode
redSpecifies the amount of red for the color of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
greenSpecifies the amount of green for the color of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
blueSpecifies the amount of blue for the color of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
alphaSpecifies the amount of the alpha channel of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f

void brics_3d::OSGPointCloudVisualizer::init ( ) [private]
void brics_3d::OSGPointCloudVisualizer::threadFunction ( OSGPointCloudVisualizer *  obj) [private]
void brics_3d::OSGPointCloudVisualizer::visualizeColoredPointCloud ( PointCloud3D *  pointCloud,
float  alpha = 1.0f 
)

Visualizes a colored point cloud within the OSG framework.

This method is the most convenient one, but it does not allow to add more (colored) point clouds, as it will start an (endless) loop to display the OSG window.

Parameters:
[in]pointCloudPointer to colored point cloud that will be visualized
alphaSpecifies the amount of the alpha channel of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
void brics_3d::OSGPointCloudVisualizer::visualizePointCloud ( PointCloud3D *  pointCloud,
float  red = 1.0f,
float  green = 1.0f,
float  blue = 1.0f,
float  alpha = 1.0f 
)

Visualizes a point cloud within the OSG framework.

This method is the most convenient one, but it does not allow to add more point clouds, as it will start an (endless) loop to display the OSG window.

Parameters:
[in]pointCloudPointer to point cloud that will be visualized
redSpecifies the amount of red for the color of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
greenSpecifies the amount of green for the color of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
blueSpecifies the amount of blue for the color of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
alphaSpecifies the amount of the alpha channel of the point cloud. Range is 0.0f to 1.0f
